items.content_html: A HTML to AST parser. This parser is based on the Zenith Parsing Engine. In fact, the code base that is used here was quite literally a conversion from Java to JavaScript. The parser is both fast and lightweight which is crucial. This is used as the basis of the clickit.education parser that converts HTML to blocks.
items.title: jamiebalfour04/lightningJS: A HTML to AST parser. This parser is based on the Zenith Parsing Engine. In fact, the code base that is used here was quite literally a conversion from Java to JavaScript. The parser is both fast and lightweight which is crucial. This is used as the basis of the clickit.education parser that converts HTML to blocks.
